Claim: "A child and a parent or older sibling go for a hike."
Referring expressions: A child, parent, older sibling, hike.  Two people, hike
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists d (exists b ((IsChildOf(a,b) and IsOnHike(d)) or (IsOlderSiblingOf(a,c) and IsOnHike(d))))))) -> (exists e (IsOnHike(e)))
